biotools.summary: Single cell STEM (scSTEM) is a shiny app based R package for visualizing and clustering genes in pseudotime ordered single cell RNA-seq data. scSTEM is a GUI based tool and thus does not require any coding experience.

bioschemas.name: scSTEM
bioschemas.summary: Single cell STEM (scSTEM) is a shiny app based R package for visualizing and clustering genes in pseudotime ordered single cell RNA-seq data. scSTEM is a GUI based tool and thus does not require any coding experience.
